0.1.name: wordpress/author-color
0.1.description:
This plugin is no longer supported

Add options to the user profile pages to set the post/page background and border color for each user. See the screenshots about what to expect.

It works only for themes that use post_class. A well written theme should use this template tag.

Please report any issue you have with this plugin on the support page.

If you find this plugin useful, please rate it accordingly. If you rate this plugin low, please let me know why.

See my oth
